speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Hey you!

speaker: Player
text: ...What? Seems I might have gotten more banged up than I thought. I'm starting to hear things.

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: You're not but if that's what you wanna think, then fine by me

speaker: Player
text: Okay, so a sign is talking now, great. Nevermind that, let's assume you're not a figment of my imagination, what do you want?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Just give ya a hand.

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Okay... but what's the catch? You want my soul or bitcoin or some other weird thing for this 'bargain'?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Look, it's true I get something from helping you but it will be of no consequence to you.

speaker: Player
text: So what is it?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: I get to be free, cause I used to be human, just like you. As to why I'm a sign, well I don't know at after so long neither do I care. All I want is to be myself again and go home!

speaker: Player
text: Alright, fine, I'm sorry that I asked about something so sensitive.

speaker: Player
text: So...

speaker: Player
text: How can you help me?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: I will explain some basics to you

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: You probably already know how to move, but you can also try running to be, y'know, faster (hold SHIFT and W,A,S or D to run in a chosen direction)

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: You seem like a resourceful fell. You should know how to use a backpack right? If so then good, 'cause it will come real handy when scavenging monster remains (press I to open the iventorym where you can view your stats and equip items)

speaker: Player
text: And why would I do that? Can't i just slice 'em in half or shoot them and be done with it?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: True, but you will miss out on the loot though. Still it's good to see you thinking somewhat logically, but remember to choose a right weapon for the right occasion (if you have two weapons equipped in the invetory, press F to switch between them)

speaker: Player
text: Okay, mom.

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Alright, Mr. Know-It-All, how about this...

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: You can stop time, reverse it and even change some underlying rules of this world (press ESC to open the pause menu, where you can save, load and exit the game as well as open the settings menu)

speaker: Player
text: ...What?

speaker: Player
text: What kinda metagaming rubbish is this? Isn't this world supposed to be, idk, immersive or something?

speaker: Player
text: And what's with all those lines that sound like static!?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Well, the information in brackets just isn't for you.

speaker: Player
text: Then for whom is it?

speaker: Helpful Sign
text: Doesn't matter, and you shouldn't care either. Anyway thanks for the help, if you meet someone else like me, be sure to talk to them. OKay, love you, bye!!!

speaker: Player
text: Wait!!!

speaker: Player
text: Useless sign, should have at least told me where the exit is. Oh well, guess I will have to find it myslef
